branchCategory.name: C(L)KU32, Pin Clamp Cylinder, w/Small Auto Switch Mounting, Plate Type
branchCategory.description: SMC's pin clamp plate type cylinder with mounting for smaller auto switches, series C(L)KUQ series was designed with 4 body types for a broad range of installation conditions. Plate type cylinder utilizes an oval piston and allows for closer pin to pin dimensions. Precision adjustment of clamping height is possible by choosing the with-shim type. Adjustment range: 0.5 to 3mm.
